title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, August 25, 2021
description: Today is the 100th birthday of the Irish novelist Brian Moore, not well known, he was respected by authors such as Graham Greene. He also wrote screenplays for people like Alfred Hitchcock.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
